Html:
help..
I've being trying to add the WebcamLib.dll to my vb.net vs 12 project through add reference, each time i tried, always got error "file coudn' t be added, please make sure that this file is accessible and that is a valid assembly or COM component".
Meanwhile it was able to add TouchlessLib.dll in the same folder....

thanks for the in advance.

my mail: walexzzytechn@gmail.com

Dear Bro,

This Touchless Lib does not required to Add webcamLib.dll as a Reference to your Project. It require Add Tocuhless Lib as a Reference. After add reference Kindly Put webcamLib.dll to Debug Folder. It's enough to Run Successfully.

All the Best
RADU MEDIA
